front-boilerplate

My custom boilerplate for fast creating front-end applications

Technologies
  • gulp
  • jade
  • LESS
  • node.js
  • mocha & chai
Frameworks

Some example frameworks you can use

  • AngularJS
  • ReactJS
  • Backbone
  • jQuery (already included)
  • Bootstrap (already included)

Bower

Use your imagination and use any of modern frameworks. Simple download any with

bower install <package-name> --save
include JS files in gulpfile.js toLIBS_PATHand CSS/LESS files in src/coffee/app.coffee

Made with ♥ by David Beran. Hosted on OpenShift.
